_meta.name: ripestat
_meta.description: RIPEStat MCP server providing network information APIs

resources.description: Get network information for an IP address or prefix
Get overview information for an Autonomous System
Get announced prefixes for an Autonomous System
Get routing status for an IP prefix
Get WHOIS information for IPs, prefixes, and ASNs
Get abuse contact information for an IP address or prefix
Get RPKI validation status for a resource (ASN) and prefix combination
Get ASN neighbours for an Autonomous System (upstream/downstream relationships)
Get the caller's public IP address with proxy header support
Get looking glass information for an IP prefix, showing BGP routing data from RIPE NCC's Route Reflection Collectors (RRCs)

tools.name: get_network_info
tools.description: Get network information for an IP address or prefix

tools.name: get_as_overview
tools.description: Get overview information for an Autonomous System

tools.name: get_announced_prefixes
tools.description: Get announced prefixes for an Autonomous System

tools.name: get_routing_status
tools.description: Get routing status for an IP prefix

tools.name: get_whois
tools.description: Get WHOIS information for IPs, prefixes, and ASNs

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: IP address, prefix, or AS number

tools.name: get_abuse_contact_finder
tools.description: Get abuse contact information for an IP address or prefix

tools.name: get_rpki_validation
tools.description: Get RPKI validation status for a resource (ASN) and prefix combination

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: AS number to validate against the prefix (e.g., 3333)

tools.name: get_asn_neighbours
tools.description: Get ASN neighbours for an Autonomous System (upstream/downstream relationships)

parameters.name: lod
parameters.description: Level of detail: 0 for basic info, 1 for detailed info (default: 0)

parameters.name: query_time
parameters.description: Query time in ISO8601 format for historical data (optional)

tools.name: get_whats_my_ip
tools.description: Get the caller's public IP address with proxy header support

tools.name: get_looking_glass
tools.description: Get looking glass information for an IP prefix, showing BGP routing data from RIPE NCC's Route Reflection Collectors (RRCs)

parameters.name: look_back_limit
parameters.description: Time limit in seconds to look back for BGP data. Maximum is 172800 seconds (48 hours). Default is 0.
